ValidationRule.description: This Validation rule is created on requesting role field to restrict user request access to particular users.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(IF(AND(($UserRole.Name = 'Read only') , ISPICKVAL( Requesting_Role__c , 'User')), TRUE, FALSE)), NOT(IF(AND(($UserRole.Name = 'User') , ISPICKVAL( Requesting_Role__c , 'Supervisor')), TRUE, FALSE)), NOT(IF(AND(($UserRole.Name = 'Supervisor') , ISPICKVAL( Requesting_Role__c , 'Admin')), TRUE, FALSE)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: User should request for appropriate roles like Read only user can request only User, User can request only Supervisor, Supervisor can request only Admin.
